Uses of Interface
io.permazen.index.Index2

  • Packages that use Index2 
    Package Description
    io.permazen
    Abstraction layer allowing access to a Database using normal Java objects.
    io.permazen.core
    Core classes for the Permazen Java persistence layer.
    io.permazen.index
    Permazen index classes.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Access a composite index on two fields.
      <V,T> Index2<V,T,Integer> JTransaction.queryListElementIndex(Class<T> targetType, String fieldName, Class<V> valueType)
      Get the composite index on a list field that includes list indices.
      <V,T,K> Index2<V,T,K> JTransaction.queryMapValueIndex(Class<T> targetType, String fieldName, Class<V> valueType, Class<K> keyType)
      Get the composite index on a map value field that includes map keys.
